channel.title: browser on Home
channel.description: Recent content in browser on Home

item.title: Must-have Browser Add-Ons
item.description: uBlock Origin (Best Ad-Blocker) Link to heading SponsorBlock Link to heading Automatically skips sponsored segment/intro/outro and more. Data is crowdsourced. Bypass Paywalls Clean Link to heading Read articles from sites like Medium. Not available in plugin stores, need to download from GitHub and import it. For e.g. .xpi file for Firefox. Dark Reader Link to heading Enable dark mode for any site.
